Thompson Group Reference Documentation (2025 Version)

About this manual and other important links

This documentation covers a variety of topics, including (but not limited to): Getting access to the KU Community Cluster, PyMOL, PACKMOL, and more. Please see the Contents section below for all available tutorials on the site. Other important links are shown below.
